Package dxf2svg.util

Class Summary
Attribute The class allows you to apply an arbitrary attribute to an SvgElement.This is to account new attributes that may be allowed in the future and for the applying of ElementEvents to SvgElements.
Base64Generator This is a UU encoder decoder object.
CustomLayerStyle This class encapsulates the concept of a AutoCAD layer object.
CustomTextStyle Encapsulates a custom text style as read from the config.d2s Style Table objects.
Database This class is a simple database that could incorporate numerous tables, each with a number of records.
DatabaseContainer This class is a container class for dxf2svg.util.Database.java classes.
Dxf2SvgConstants This class represents all of the constants that are required for the Dxf2Svg conversion process.
Dxf2SvgGui This class handles displayable message boxes that contain context sesitive messages.
DxfElementPair DxfElementPair is a wrapper class for the primitive data types extracted from a Dxf file.
DXFFilter Filters for DXF files; *.dxf.
DxfParser Reads and parses either an ASCII or Binary AutoCAD DXF file.
DxfSearchEngine Searches for patterns in an ASCII AutoCAD DXF file.
EventAttributeModifier This object extracts text content from an SvgText element and modifies the argument list of any javascript function call found as the value of an Attribute.
FontMapElement This object is created to manage fonts internally to Dxf2Svg.
GraphicLinkDatabase This class represents a database of graphic link targets.
GraphicLinksDatabaseReader This class is called by the DxfPreprocessor and opens, reads the Graphic Links Database then retains the database for query until the application stops.
LimitsFrame This class encapsulates the rectangular frame represented by the drawing limits set in the DXF file being converted.
Pen This class encapsulates an AutoCAD pen object.
ProcessorManager This object manages the various processors switching states as the Dxf file is interpreted.
RelativeLimitsFrame This class represents a rectangular frame by which and object can query if another object falls within its bounderies.
ShowLicense This class is used to show the licencing information on the command line through the command line.
SvgUtil This class provides various utilities and conversions methods.
TableLayer This class represents an encapsulation of DXF layer tables.
TableLineType This object, in many ways, is subserviant to the TableLayer object.
TableStyles Encapsulates DXF Text Style Table objects.
 

Exception Summary
BoardNumberNotFoundException This exception gets thrown if the search for boardnos produces no results.
FigureListLibraryNotFoundException This exception gets thrown if the figure list database could not be found.
FigureTitleNotFoundException This exception gets thrown if the search for Figure titles produces no results.
NDIDNotFoundException This exception gets thrown if the search for an NDID produces no results.
